name: PatManPlus
description: Allows junior doctors to manage their patient lists to provide an efficient way to complete a ward round
author: me

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run lint
scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run clean:osx && build . "NHS Hack Day - OSX" --out=dist/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.2 --ignore=dist --ignore=assets --ignore=builder.json --ignore=bower.json --ignore=README.md --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=preview.png
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:win && build . "NHS Hack Day - Windows" --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.36.2 --ignore=dist --ignore=assets --ignore=builder.json --ignore=bower.json --ignore=README.md --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=preview.png
scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.repair:sqlite: npm uninstall sqlite3 && npm i sqlite3 && npm run rebuild
scripts.repair:mocha: npm uninstall -D mocha && npm i -D mocha
